articles.title: Wow! European space agency to replicate Moon`s surface on Earth. Check VIDEO - WION
articles.description: WATCH | European space agency to replicate Moons surface on Earth
articles.content:
European Space Agency (ESA) dropped a bomb on its social media feeds on Tuesday (Jan 23) for a jaw-dropping adventure of recreating the Moon's surface here on Earth!
